ack.title: Authors’ contributions
ack.p: TJ, VG, and MR carried out process simulations. MC and OC modeled agricultural phase and performed environmental assessment. CJ and MW calculated capital and operational costs. AM discussed alternatives for public policies. AB coordinated the study, including the definition of scenarios. TJ was a major contributor in writing the manuscript. All authors contributed to the writing of specific sections. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
